018package org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.codebuilders;
019
020import static java.lang.reflect.Modifier.isPublic;
021import static java.lang.reflect.Modifier.isStatic;
022import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.FINAL;
023import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PRIVATE;
024import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PUBLIC;
025import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.DEFAULT_ACCESSOR_TYPE;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.ENUM_ACCESSOR_TYPE;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.LIST_ACCESSOR_TYPE;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MAP_ACCESSOR_TYPE;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_AccessorMissing;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_MissingEnvironmentVar;
032import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_MissingStringConverter;
033import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_MissingStringConverterWithType;
034import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_MissingSystemProp;
035import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_NoCollection;
036import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_PreferencesNotConfigured;
037import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.SET_ACCESSOR_TYPE;
038import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.ALLOWS_PREFERENCES;
039import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.GETTER_RETURNS_OPTIONAL;
040import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.PROPERTY_IS_ARGUMENT;
041import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.PROPERTY_IS_MUTABLE;
042import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.PROPERTY_IS_OPTION;
043import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.PROPERTY_REQUIRES_SYNCHRONIZATION;
044import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.SETTER_CHECK_EMPTY;
045import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.SETTER_CHECK_NULL;
046import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.SYSTEM_PREFERENCE;
047import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_ListenerSupport;
048import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_ReadLock;
049import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_WriteLock;
050import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.Primitives.VOID;
051import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.EMPTY_STRING;
052import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
053import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
054import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
055
056import java.util.ArrayList;
057import java.util.Date;
058import java.util.EnumMap;
059import java.util.HashMap;
060import java.util.HashSet;
061import java.util.Iterator;
062import java.util.List;
063import java.util.Map;
064import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
065import java.util.Optional;
066import java.util.Set;
067import java.util.function.Supplier;
068import java.util.prefs.BackingStoreException;
069import java.util.prefs.Preferences;
070import java.util.stream.Stream;
071
072import org.apiguardian.api.API;
073import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
074import org.tquadrat.foundation.ap.CodeGenerationError;
075import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.CodeGenerationConfiguration;
076import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec;
077import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder;
078import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.PropertySpecImpl;
079import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.UnexpectedExceptionError;
080import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.UnsupportedEnumError;

096/**
097 *  The abstract base class for all the code builders.
098 *
099 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
100 *  @version $Id: CodeBuilderBase.java 946 2021-12-23 14:48:19Z tquadrat $
101 *  @UMLGraph.link
102 *  @since 0.1.0
103 */
104@SuppressWarnings( "OverlyCoupledClass" )
105@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: CodeBuilderBase.java 946 2021-12-23 14:48:19Z tquadrat $" )
106@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.1.0" )
107abstract sealed class CodeBuilderBase implements CodeBuilder
108    permits CLIBeanBuilder, ConfigBeanBuilder, I18nSupportBuilder, INIBeanBuilder, MapImplementor, PreferencesBeanBuilder, SessionBeanBuilder
109{
110        /*------------*\
111    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
112        \*------------*/
113    /**
114     *  The class builder.
115     */
116    private final TypeSpec.Builder m_ClassBuilder;
117
118    /**
119     *  The composer.
120     */
121    @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
122    private final JavaComposer m_Composer;
123
124    /**
125     *  The configuration for the code generation.
126     */
127    @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
128    private final CodeGenerationConfiguration m_Configuration;
129
130    /**
131     *  The builder for body of the constructor.
132     */
133    private final CodeBlock.Builder m_ConstructorCode;
134
135    /**
136     *  The code generator context.
137     */
138    private final CodeGeneratorContext m_Context;
139
140    /**
141     *  The synchronised flag.
142     */
143    private final boolean m_IsSynchronized;
144
145    /**
146     *  The standard fields.
147     */
148    private static final Map<StandardField,FieldSpec> m_StandardFields = new EnumMap<>( StandardField.class );
149
150    /**
151     *  The standard methods.
152     */
153    private static final Map<StandardMethod,MethodSpec> m_StandardMethods = new EnumMap<>( StandardMethod.class );
154
155        /*------------------------*\
156    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
157        \*------------------------*/
158    /**
159     *  The registry for the known implementations of
160     *  {@link StringConverter}
161     *  implementations.
162     */
163    private static final LazyMap<TypeName,TypeName> m_ConverterRegistry;
164
165    static
166    {
167        m_ConverterRegistry = LazyMap.use( true, CodeBuilderBase::loadStringConverters );
168    }
169
170        /*--------------*\
171    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
172        \*--------------*/
173    /**
174     *  Creates a new instance of {@code CodeBuilderBase}.
175     *
176     *  @param  context The code generator context.
177     */
178    protected CodeBuilderBase( final CodeGeneratorContext context )
179    {
180        m_Context = requireNonNullArgument( context, "context" );
181
182        m_Configuration = m_Context.getConfiguration();
183        m_Composer = m_Configuration.getComposer();
184        m_ClassBuilder = m_Context.getClassBuilder();
185        m_ConstructorCode = m_Context.getConstructorCodeBuilder();
186
187        m_IsSynchronized = m_Configuration.getSynchronizationRequired();
188
189        m_Configuration.getInitDataMethod().ifPresent( m -> m_StandardMethods.put( StandardMethod.STD_METHOD_InitData, m ) );
190    }   //  CodeBuilderBase()
191
192        /*---------*\
193    ====** Methods **==========================================================
194        \*---------*/
195    /**
196     *  Adds an argument to the constructor.
197     *
198     *  @param  argument    The parameter to add.
199     */
200    protected final void addConstructorArgument( final ParameterSpec argument )
201    {
202        final var constructorBuilder = m_Context.getConstructorBuilder();
203        constructorBuilder.addParameter( requireNonNullArgument( argument, "argument" ) );
204    }   //  addConstructorArgument()
205
206    /**
207     *  Adds code to the constructor body.
208     *
209     *  @param  code    The code to add.
210     */
211    protected final void addConstructorCode( final CodeBlock code )
212    {
213        m_ConstructorCode.add( requireNonNullArgument( code, "code" ) );
214    }   //  addConstructorCode()
215
216    /**
217     *  Adds a warning to the
218     *  {@link java.lang.SuppressWarnings &#64;SuppressWarnings}
219     *  annotation for the constructor of the new configuration bean.
220     *
221     *  @param  warning The warning to suppress.
222     */
223    protected final void addConstructorSuppressedWarning( final SuppressableWarnings warning )
224    {
225        m_Context.addConstructorSuppressedWarning( warning );
226    }   //  addConstructorSuppressedWarning()
227
228    /**
229     *  Adds the given field to the new class.
230     *
231     *  @param  field   The field to add.
232     */
233    protected final void addField( final FieldSpec field )
234    {
235        m_ClassBuilder.addField( requireNonNullArgument( field, "field" ) );
236    }   //  addField()
237
238    /**
239     *  Adds the given standard field to the new class.
240     *
241     *  @param  reference   The identifier for the standard field.
242     *  @param  field   The field to add.
243     */
244    protected final void addField( final StandardField reference, final FieldSpec field )
245    {
246        addField( field );
247        m_StandardFields.put( requireNonNullArgument( reference, "reference" ), field );
248    }   //  addField()
249
250    /**
251     *  Adds the given method to the new class.
252     *
253     *  @param  method  The method to add.
254     */
255    protected final void addMethod( final MethodSpec method )
256    {
257        m_ClassBuilder.addMethod( requireNonNullArgument( method, "method" ) );
258    }   //  addMethod()
259
260    /**
261     *  Adds the given method to the new class.
262     *
263     *  @param  reference   The identifier for the standard method.
264     *  @param  method  The method to add.
265     */
266    protected final void addMethod( final StandardMethod reference, final MethodSpec method )
267    {
268        addMethod( method );
269        m_StandardMethods.put( requireNonNullArgument( reference, "reference" ), method );
270    }   //  addMethod()
271
272    /**
273     *  {@inheritDoc}
274     */
275    @SuppressWarnings( "AbstractMethodOverridesAbstractMethod" )
276    @Override
277    public abstract void build();
278
279    /**
280     *  The default implementation of the method that composes an 'add' method
281     *  for the given property.
282     *
283     *  @param  codeBuilder The factory for the code generation.
284     *  @param  property    The property.
285     *  @return The method specification.
286     */
287    @SuppressWarnings( {"OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent", "EnhancedSwitchMigration", "UseOfConcreteClass", "StaticMethodOnlyUsedInOneClass"} )
288    public static MethodSpec composeAddMethod( final CodeBuilder codeBuilder, final PropertySpecImpl property )
289    {
290        final var composer = requireNonNullArgument( codeBuilder, "codeBuilder" ).getComposer();
291
292        //---* Obtain the builder *--------------------------------------------
293        final var builder = property.getAddMethodBuilder()
294            .orElseGet( () -> composer.methodBuilder( property.getAddMethodName().get() )
295                .addAnnotation( Override.class )
296                .addModifiers( PUBLIC )
297                .returns( VOID )
298            );
299        builder.addModifiers( FINAL )
300            .addJavadoc( composer.createInheritDocComment() );
301
302        //---* Add the locking *-----------------------------------------------
303        final var lock = property.hasFlag( PROPERTY_REQUIRES_SYNCHRONIZATION ) ? codeBuilder.getField( STD_FIELD_WriteLock ) : null;
304        if( nonNull( lock) ) builder.beginControlFlow(
305            """
306            try( final var l = $N.lock() )
307            """, lock );
308
309        //---* Assign the value *----------------------------------------------
310        final var argumentType = switch( property.getCollectionKind() )
311            {
312                case LIST, SET ->
313                    {
314                        if( property.getPropertyType() instanceof ParameterizedTypeName propertyType )
315                        {
316                            final var typeArguments = propertyType.typeArguments();
317                            yield typeArguments.get( 0 );
318                        }
319                        yield ClassName.from( Object.class );
320                    }
321
322                case MAP ->
323                    {
324                        TypeName keyType = ClassName.from( Object.class );
325                        TypeName valueType = ClassName.from( Object.class );
326                        if( property.getPropertyType() instanceof ParameterizedTypeName propertyType )
327                        {
328                            final var typeArguments = propertyType.typeArguments();
329                            keyType = typeArguments.get( 0 );
330                            valueType = typeArguments.get( 1 );
331                        }
332                        final var entryType = ClassName.from( Map.Entry.class );
333                        yield ParameterizedTypeName.from( entryType, keyType, valueType );
334                    }
335
336                case NO_COLLECTION -> throw new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_NoCollection, property.getAddMethodName().get(), property.getPropertyName() ) );
337
338                default -> throw new UnsupportedEnumError( property.getCollectionKind() );
339            };
340
341        //---* Create the parameter *------------------------------------------
342        final var parameter = composer.parameterOf( argumentType, property.getAddMethodArgumentName(), FINAL );
343        builder.addParameter( parameter );
344
345        //---* Obtain the field *----------------------------------------------
346        final var field = property.getFieldName();
347
348        //---* Create the code *-----------------------------------------------
349        builder.addStatement( "$T oldValue = null", property.getPropertyType() )
350            .beginControlFlow(
351                """
352                if( isNull( $N ) )
353                """, field )
354            .addStaticImport( Objects.class, "isNull" );
355        switch( property.getCollectionKind() )
356        {
357            case LIST:
358            {
359                builder.addStatement( "$1N = new $2T<>()", field, ArrayList.class )
360                    .nextControlFlow(
361                        """
362
363                        else
364                        """ )
365                    .addStatement( "oldValue = $1T.copyOf( $2N )", List.class, field )
366                    .endControlFlow()
367                    .addStatement( "$1N.add( requireNonNullArgument( $2N, $3S ) )", field, parameter, property.getAddMethodArgumentName() )
368                    .addStaticImport( Objects.class, "requireNonNullArgument" )
369                    .addStatement( "$1N.fireEvent( $2S, oldValue, $3T.copyOf( $4N ) )", codeBuilder.getField( STD_FIELD_ListenerSupport ), property.getPropertyName(), List.class, field );
370                break;
371            }
372
373            case MAP:
374            {
375                builder.addStatement( "$1N = new $2T<>()", field, HashMap.class )
376                    .nextControlFlow(
377                        """
378
379                        else
380                        """ )
381                    .addStatement( "oldValue = $T.copyOf( $N )", Map.class, field )
382                    .endControlFlow()
383                    .addStatement( "var key = requireNonNullArgument( $1N, $2S ).getKey()", parameter, property.getAddMethodArgumentName() )
384                    .addStaticImport( Objects.class, "requireNonNullArgument" )
385                    .addStatement( "var value = $N.getValue()", parameter )
386                    .addStatement( "$1N.put( requireNonNullArgument( key, $2S + \".key\" ), requireNonNullArgument( value, $2S + \".value\" ) )", field, property.getAddMethodArgumentName() )
387                    .addStatement( "$1N.fireEvent( $2S, oldValue, $3T.copyOf( $4N ) )", codeBuilder.getField( STD_FIELD_ListenerSupport ), property.getPropertyName(), Map.class, field );
388                break;
389            }
390
391            case SET:
392            {
393                builder.addStatement( "$1N = new $2T<>()", field, HashSet.class )
394                    .nextControlFlow(
395                        """
396
397                        else
398                        """ )
399                    .addStatement( "oldValue = $1T.copyOf( $2N )", Set.class, field )
400                    .endControlFlow()
401                    .addStatement( "$1N.add( requireNonNullArgument( $2N, $3S ) )", field, parameter, property.getAddMethodArgumentName() )
402                    .addStaticImport( Objects.class, "requireNonNullArgument" )
403                    .addStatement( "$1N.fireEvent( $2S, oldValue, $3T.copyOf( $4N ) )", codeBuilder.getField( STD_FIELD_ListenerSupport ), property.getPropertyName(), Set.class, field );
404                break;
405            }
406
407            case NO_COLLECTION: throw new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_NoCollection, property.getAddMethodName().get(), property.getPropertyName() ) );
408
409            default: throw new UnsupportedEnumError( property.getCollectionKind() );
410        }
411        builder.endControlFlow();
412
413        //---* Cleanup *-------------------------------------------------------
414        if( nonNull( lock) ) builder.endControlFlow();
415
416        //---* Create the return value *---------------------------------------
417        final var retValue = builder.build();
418
419        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
420        return retValue;
421    }   //  composeAddMethod()
422
423    /**
424     *  The default implementation of the method that composes a constructor
425     *  fragment for the initialisation of the given property in cases it is
426     *  annotated with
427     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.EnvironmentVariable &#64;EnvironmentVariable}.
428     *
429     *  @param  codeBuilder The factory for the code generation.
430     *  @param  property    The property.
431     *  @return The field specification.
432     */
433    @SuppressWarnings( {"UseOfConcreteClass", "TypeMayBeWeakened", "StaticMethodOnlyUsedInOneClass"} )
434    public static CodeBlock composeConstructorFragment4Environment( final CodeBuilder codeBuilder, final PropertySpecImpl property )
435    {
436        final var builder = requireNonNullArgument( codeBuilder, "codeBuilder" ).getComposer()
437            .codeBlockBuilder()
438            .add(
439                """
440                
441                /*
442                 * Initialise the property '$N' from the system environment.
443                 */
444                """, property.getPropertyName()
445            )
446            .beginControlFlow( EMPTY_STRING );
447
448        //---* Set the StringConverter *---------------------------------------
449        final var stringConverter = property.getStringConverterClass()
450            .orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_MissingStringConverter, property.getPropertyName() ) ) );
451        if( determineStringConverterInstantiation( stringConverter ) )
452        {
453            builder.addStatement( "final var stringConverter = $T.INSTANCE", stringConverter );
454        }
455        else
456        {
457            builder.addStatement( "final var stringConverter = new $T()", stringConverter );
458        }
459
460        //---* Set the value *-------------------------------------------------
461        builder.addStatement( "final var value = getenv( $1S )", property.getEnvironmentVariableName().orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_MissingEnvironmentVar, property.getPropertyName()) ) ) )
462            .addStaticImport( System.class, "getenv" )
463            .addStatement( "$1N = stringConverter.fromString( value )", property.getFieldName() )
464            .endControlFlow();
465
466        //---* Create the return value *---------------------------------------
467        final var retValue = builder.build();
468
469        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
470        return retValue;
471    }   //  composeConstructorFragment4Environment()
472
473    /**
474     *  The default implementation of the method that composes a constructor
475     *  fragment for the initialisation of the given property in cases it is
476     *  annotated with
477     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.EnvironmentVariable &#64;EnvironmentVariable}.
478     *
479     *  @param  codeBuilder The factory for the code generation.
480     *  @param  property    The property.
481     *  @return The field specification.
482     */
483    @SuppressWarnings( {"UseOfConcreteClass", "TypeMayBeWeakened", "StaticMethodOnlyUsedInOneClass"} )
484    public static CodeBlock composeConstructorFragment4SystemPreference( final CodeBuilder codeBuilder, final PropertySpecImpl property )
485    {
486        final var composer = requireNonNullArgument( codeBuilder, "codeBuilder" ).getComposer();
487
488        /*
489         * Create the lambdas for the getter and the setter.
490         * The getter is not used, but required for the constructor of the
491         * PropertyAccess instance.
492         */
493        final var getter = composer.lambdaBuilder()
494            .addCode( "$N", requireNonNullArgument( property, "property" ).getFieldName() )
495            .build();
496        final var setter = composer.lambdaBuilder()
497            .addParameter( "p" )
498            .addCode( "$N = p", property.getFieldName() )
499            .build();
500
501        //---* The accessor class *--------------------------------------------
502        final var accessorClass = property.getPrefsAccessorClass()
503            .orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_AccessorMissing, property.getPropertyName() ) ) );
504
505        //---* The path to the node *------------------------------------------
506        final var path = property.getSystemPrefsPath()
507            .orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_PreferencesNotConfigured, property.getPropertyName() ) ) );
508
509        //---* The key for the value *-----------------------------------------
510        final var key = property.getPrefsKey()
511            .orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_PreferencesNotConfigured, property.getPropertyName() ) ) );
512
513        final var builder = composer
514            .codeBlockBuilder()
515            .add(
516                """
517                
518                /*
519                 * Initialise the property '$N' from the SYSTEM {@code Preferences}.
520                 *
521                 * Path: $L
522                 * Key : $L
523                 */
524                """, property.getPropertyName(), path, key
525            )
526            .beginControlFlow(
527                """
528                try
529                """ )
530            .beginControlFlow(
531                """
532                if( systemRoot().nodeExists( $S ) )
533                """, path )
534            .addStaticImport( Preferences.class, "systemRoot" )
535            .addStatement( "final var node = systemRoot().node( $S )", path );
536
537        //noinspection IfStatementWithTooManyBranches
538        if( accessorClass.equals( ENUM_ACCESSOR_TYPE ) )
539        {
540            final var propertyType = property.getPropertyType();
541            builder.addStatement( "final var accessor = new $2T<>( $1S, $3T.class, $4L, $5L )", key, accessorClass, propertyType, getter, setter );
542        }
543        else if( accessorClass.equals( LIST_ACCESSOR_TYPE ) || accessorClass.equals( SET_ACCESSOR_TYPE ) )
544        {
545            final var propertyType = (ParameterizedTypeName) property.getPropertyType();
546            final var argumentType = propertyType.typeArguments().get( 0 );
547            final var stringConverterType = getStringConverter( argumentType )
548                .orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_MissingStringConverterWithType, property.getPropertyName(), argumentType.toString() ) ) );
549            if( determineStringConverterInstantiation( stringConverterType ) )
550            {
551                builder.addStatement( "final var accessor = new $2T<>( $1S, $3T.INSTANCE, $4L, $5L )", key, accessorClass, stringConverterType, getter, setter );
552            }
553            else
554            {
555                builder.addStatement( "final var accessor = new $2T<>( $1S, new $3T(), $4L, $5L )", key, accessorClass, stringConverterType, getter, setter );
556            }
557        }
558        else if( accessorClass.equals( MAP_ACCESSOR_TYPE ) )
559        {
560            final var propertyType = (ParameterizedTypeName) property.getPropertyType();
561            final var argumentTypes = propertyType.typeArguments();
562            final var keyStringConverterType = getStringConverter( argumentTypes.get( 0 ) )
563                .orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_MissingStringConverterWithType, property.getPropertyName(), argumentTypes.get( 0 ).toString() ) ) );
564            final var keySnippet = determineStringConverterInstantiation( keyStringConverterType ) ? "$3T.INSTANCE" : "new $3T()";
565            final var valueStringConverterType = getStringConverter( argumentTypes.get( 1 ) )
566                .orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_MissingStringConverterWithType, property.getPropertyName(), argumentTypes.get( 1 ).toString() ) ) );
567            final var valueSnippet = determineStringConverterInstantiation( valueStringConverterType ) ? "$4T.INSTANCE" : "new $4T()";
568            builder.addStatement( format( "final var accessor = new $2T<>( $1S, %1$s, %2$s, $5L, $6L )", keySnippet, valueSnippet ), key, accessorClass, keyStringConverterType, valueStringConverterType, getter, setter );
569        }
570        else if( accessorClass.equals( DEFAULT_ACCESSOR_TYPE ) )
571        {
572            final var stringConverterType = property.getStringConverterClass()
573                .orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_MissingStringConverter, property.getPropertyName() ) ) );
574            if( determineStringConverterInstantiation( stringConverterType ) )
575            {
576                builder.addStatement( "final var accessor = new $2T<>( $1S, $4L, $5L, $3T.INSTANCE )", key, accessorClass, stringConverterType, getter, setter );
577            }
578            else
579            {
580                builder.addStatement( "final var accessor = new $2T<>( $1S, $4L, $5L, new $3T() )", key, accessorClass, stringConverterType, getter, setter );
581            }
582        }
583        else
584        {
585            builder.addStatement( "final var accessor = new $2T( $1S, $3L, $4L )", key, accessorClass, getter, setter );
586        }
587
588        //---* Add the code to read the Preferences *--------------------------
589        builder.addStatement( "accessor.readPreference( node )" )
590            .endControlFlow()
591            .nextControlFlow(
592                """
593        
594                catch( final $T e )
595                """, BackingStoreException.class )
596            .addStatement( "throw new $T( e )", ExceptionInInitializerError.class )
597            .endControlFlow();
598
599        //---* Create the return value *---------------------------------------
600        final var retValue = builder.build();
601
602        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
603        return retValue;
604    }   //  composeConstructorFragment4SystemPreference()
605
606    /**
607     *  The default implementation of the method that composes a constructor
608     *  fragment for the initialisation of the given property in cases it is
609     *  annotated with
610     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.EnvironmentVariable &#64;EnvironmentVariable}.
611     *
612     *  @param  codeBuilder The factory for the code generation.
613     *  @param  property    The property.
614     *  @return The field specification.
615     */
616    @SuppressWarnings( {"UseOfConcreteClass", "TypeMayBeWeakened", "StaticMethodOnlyUsedInOneClass"} )
617    public static CodeBlock composeConstructorFragment4SystemProp( final CodeBuilder codeBuilder, final PropertySpecImpl property )
618    {
619        final var builder = requireNonNullArgument( codeBuilder, "codeBuilder" ).getComposer()
620            .codeBlockBuilder()
621            .add(
622                """
623                
624                /*
625                 * Initialise the property '$N' from the system properties.
626                 */
627                """, property.getPropertyName()
628            )
629            .beginControlFlow( EMPTY_STRING );
630
631        //---* Set the StringConverter *---------------------------------------
632        final var stringConverter = property.getStringConverterClass()
633            .orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_MissingStringConverter, property.getPropertyName() ) ) );
634        if( determineStringConverterInstantiation( stringConverter ) )
635        {
636            builder.addStatement( "final var stringConverter = $T.INSTANCE", stringConverter );
637        }
638        else
639        {
640            builder.addStatement( "final var stringConverter = new $T()", stringConverter );
641        }
642
643        //---* Set the value *-------------------------------------------------
644        builder.addStatement( "final var value = getProperty( $1S )", property.getSystemPropertyName().orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_MissingSystemProp, property.getPropertyName()) ) ) )
645            .addStaticImport( System.class, "getProperty" )
646            .addStatement( "$1N = stringConverter.fromString( value )", property.getFieldName() )
647            .endControlFlow();
648
649        //---* Create the return value *---------------------------------------
650        final var retValue = builder.build();
651
652        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
653        return retValue;
654    }   //  composeConstructorFragment4SystemProp()
655
656    /**
657     *  The default implementation of the method that composes a field for the
658     *  given property.
659     *
660     *  @param  codeBuilder The factory for the code generation.
661     *  @param  property    The property.
662     *  @return The field specification.
663     */
664    @SuppressWarnings( {"UseOfConcreteClass", "StaticMethodOnlyUsedInOneClass"} )
665    public static FieldSpec composeField( final CodeBuilder codeBuilder, final PropertySpecImpl property )
666    {
667        final var composer = requireNonNullArgument( codeBuilder, "codeBuilder" ).getComposer();
668
669        final var builder = composer.fieldBuilder( property.getPropertyType(), property.getFieldName(), PRIVATE )
670            .addJavadoc(
671                """
672                Property: &quot;$L&quot;.
673                """, property.getPropertyName() );
674        if( Stream.of( PROPERTY_IS_MUTABLE, PROPERTY_IS_OPTION, PROPERTY_IS_ARGUMENT, ALLOWS_PREFERENCES, SYSTEM_PREFERENCE ).noneMatch( property::hasFlag ) )
675        {
676            builder.addModifiers( FINAL );
677        }
678
679        //---* Create the return value *--------------------------------------
680        final var retValue = builder.build();
681
682        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
683        return retValue;
684    }   //  composeField()
685
686    /**
687     *  The default implementation of the method that composes a getter for the
688     *  given property.
689     *
690     *  @param  codeBuilder The factory for the code generation.
691     *  @param  property    The property.
692     *  @return The method specification.
693     */
694    @SuppressWarnings( {"OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent", "UseOfConcreteClass", "TypeMayBeWeakened", "StaticMethodOnlyUsedInOneClass"} )
695    public static MethodSpec composeGetter( final CodeBuilder codeBuilder, final PropertySpecImpl property )
696    {
697        final var composer = requireNonNullArgument( codeBuilder, "codeBuilder" ).getComposer();
698
699        //---* Obtain the builder *--------------------------------------------
700        final var builder = property.getGetterBuilder()
701            .orElseGet( () -> composer.methodBuilder( property.getGetterMethodName().get() )
702                .addAnnotation( Override.class )
703                .addModifiers( PUBLIC )
704                .returns( property.getGetterReturnType() )
705            );
706        builder.addModifiers( FINAL )
707            .addJavadoc( composer.createInheritDocComment() );
708
709        //---* Add the locking *-----------------------------------------------
710        final var lock = property.hasFlag( PROPERTY_REQUIRES_SYNCHRONIZATION ) && property.hasFlag( PROPERTY_IS_MUTABLE )
711                         ? codeBuilder.getField( STD_FIELD_ReadLock )
712                         : null;
713        if( nonNull( lock) ) builder.beginControlFlow(
714            """
715            try( final var ignored = $N.lock() )
716            """, lock );
717
718        //---* Return the value *----------------------------------------------
719        if( property.hasFlag( GETTER_RETURNS_OPTIONAL ) )
720        {
721            builder.addStatement( "return $1T.ofNullable( $2N )", Optional.class, property.getFieldName() );
722        }
723        else
724        {
725            builder.addStatement( "return $1N", property.getFieldName() );
726        }
727
728        //---* Cleanup *-------------------------------------------------------
729        if( nonNull( lock) ) builder.endControlFlow();
730
731        //---* Create the return value *---------------------------------------
732        final var retValue = builder.build();
733
734        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
735        return retValue;
736    }   //  composeGetter()
737
738    /**
739     *  The default implementation of the method that composes a setter for the
740     *  given property.
741     *
742     *  @param  codeBuilder The factory for the code generation.
743     *  @param  property    The property.
744     *  @return The method specification.
745     */
746    @SuppressWarnings( {"OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent", "UseOfConcreteClass", "TypeMayBeWeakened", "StaticMethodOnlyUsedInOneClass"} )
747    public static MethodSpec composeSetter( final CodeBuilder codeBuilder, final PropertySpecImpl property )
748    {
749        final var composer = requireNonNullArgument( codeBuilder, "codeBuilder" ).getComposer();
750
751        //---* Obtain the builder *--------------------------------------------
752        final var builder = property.getSetterBuilder()
753            .orElseGet( () -> composer.methodBuilder( property.getSetterMethodName().get() )
754                .addAnnotation( Override.class )
755                .addModifiers( PUBLIC )
756                .addParameter( composer.parameterOf( property.getPropertyType(), property.getSetterArgumentName(), FINAL ) )
757                .returns( VOID )
758            );
759        builder.addModifiers( FINAL )
760            .addJavadoc( composer.createInheritDocComment() );
761
762        //---* Add the locking *-----------------------------------------------
763        final var lock = property.hasFlag( PROPERTY_REQUIRES_SYNCHRONIZATION ) ? codeBuilder.getField( STD_FIELD_WriteLock ) : null;
764        if( nonNull( lock) ) builder.beginControlFlow(
765            """
766            try( final var ignored = $N.lock() )
767            """, lock );
768
769        //---* Assign the value *----------------------------------------------
770        if( property.hasFlag( SETTER_CHECK_EMPTY ) )
771        {
772            final var methodName = "requireNotEmptyArgument";
773            builder.addStatement(
774                    """
775                    final var newValue = $2N( $1N, $1S )\
776                    """, property.getSetterArgumentName(), methodName )
777                .addStaticImport( Objects.class, methodName );
778        }
779        else if( property.hasFlag( SETTER_CHECK_NULL ) )
780        {
781            final var methodName = "requireNonNullArgument";
782            builder.addStatement(
783                    """
784                    final var newValue = $2N( $1N, $1S )\
785                    """, property.getSetterArgumentName(), methodName )
786                .addStaticImport( Objects.class, methodName );
787        }
788        else
789        {
790            builder.addStatement(
791                """
792                final var newValue = $1N\
793                """, property.getSetterArgumentName() );
794        }
795        builder.addStatement(
796                """
797                $1N.fireEvent( $2S, $3N, newValue )\
798                """, codeBuilder.getField( STD_FIELD_ListenerSupport ), property.getPropertyName(), property.getFieldName() )
799            .addStatement(
800                """
801                $1N = newValue\
802                """, property.getFieldName() );
803
804        //---* Cleanup *-------------------------------------------------------
805        if( nonNull( lock) ) builder.endControlFlow();
806
807        //---* Create the return value *---------------------------------------
808        final var retValue = builder.build();
809
810        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
811        return retValue;
812    }   //  composeSetter()
813
814    /**
815     *  Determines how to instantiate the given implementation of
816     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.StringConverter}.
817     *
818     *  @param  stringConverterClass    The String converter class.
819     *  @return {@code true} if the class provides a static {@code INSTANCE}
820     *      field, {@code false} if the default constructor must be used.
821     */
822    @SuppressWarnings( "TryWithIdenticalCatches" )
823    protected static final boolean determineStringConverterInstantiation( final TypeName stringConverterClass )
824    {
825        var retValue = false;
826        if( requireNonNullArgument( stringConverterClass, "stringConverterClass" ) instanceof ClassName className )
827        {
828            try
829            {
830                final var candidateClass = Class.forName( className.canonicalName(), false, CodeBuilderBase.class.getClassLoader() );
831                final var field = candidateClass.getField( "INSTANCE" );
832                final var modifiers = field.getModifiers();
833                retValue = field.canAccess( null ) && isPublic( modifiers ) && isStatic( modifiers );
834            }
835            catch( @SuppressWarnings( "unused" ) final NoSuchFieldException | SecurityException e )
836            {
837                /*
838                 * There is no INSTANCE field, or it is not static, or not public,
839                 * or it is otherwise not accessible to this method.
840                 */
841                retValue = false;
842            }
843            catch( @SuppressWarnings( "unused" ) final ClassNotFoundException e )
844            {
845                /*
846                 * The class for the StringConverter implementation does not
847                 * exist.
848                 */
849                retValue = false;
850            }
851        }
852
853        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
854        return retValue;
855    }   //  determineStringConverterInstantiation
856
857    /**
858     *  {@inheritDoc}
859     */
860    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
861    @Override
862    public final JavaComposer getComposer() { return m_Composer; }
863
864    /**
865     *  {@inheritDoc}
866     */
867    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
868    @Override
869    public final CodeGenerationConfiguration getConfiguration() { return m_Configuration; }
870
871    /**
872     *  {@inheritDoc}
873     */
874    @Override
875    public final FieldSpec getField( final StandardField reference )
876    {
877        final var retValue = m_StandardFields.get( requireNonNullArgument( reference, "reference" ) );
878
879        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
880        return retValue;
881    }   //  getField()
882
883    /**
884     *  {@inheritDoc}
885     */
886    @Override
887    public final MethodSpec getMethod( final StandardMethod reference )
888    {
889        final var retValue = m_StandardMethods.get( requireNonNullArgument( reference, "reference" ) );
890
891        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
892        return retValue;
893    }   //  getMethod()
894
895    /**
896     *  Returns an iterator over the configured properties.
897     *
898     *  @return The iterator.
899     */
900    protected final Iterator<PropertySpec> getProperties() { return m_Configuration.propertyIterator(); }
901
902    /**
903     *  Returns the
904     *  {@link StringConverter}
905     *  type for the given type.
906     *
907     *  @param  type    The type.
908     *  @return An instance of
909     *      {@link Optional}
910     *      that holds the requested implementation of
911     *      {@code StringConverter}.
912     */
913    protected static final Optional<TypeName> getStringConverter( final TypeName type )
914    {
915        final var retValue = Optional.ofNullable( m_ConverterRegistry.get( requireNonNullArgument( type, "type" ) ) );
916
917        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
918        return retValue;
919    }   //  getStringConverter()
920
921    /**
922     *  Returns the flag that controls whether the configuration bean has to be
923     *  generated thread safe.
924     *
925     *  @return {@code true} if lock support is required, {@code false}
926     *      otherwise.
927     */
928    protected final boolean isSynchronized() { return m_IsSynchronized; }
929
930    /**
931     *  The implementation of
932     *  {@link Supplier}
933     *  that loads the known
934     *  {@link StringConverter}
935     *  instances for
936     *  {@link #m_ConverterRegistry}.
937     *
938     *  @return The String converters.
939     *
940     *  @see    LazyMap#use(boolean, Supplier)
941     */
942    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfObsoleteDateTimeApi" )
943    private static final Map<TypeName,TypeName> loadStringConverters()
944    {
945        final Map<TypeName,TypeName> retValue = new HashMap<>();
946        retValue.put( TypeName.from( Date.class ), TypeName.from( DateLongStringConverter.class ) );
947        for( final var type : StringConverter.list() )
948        {
949            @SuppressWarnings( "rawtypes" )
950            final Class<? extends StringConverter> converterClass;
951            try
952            {
953                converterClass = StringConverter.forClass( type )
954                    .orElseThrow()
955                    .getClass();
956            }
957            catch( final NoSuchElementException e )
958            {
959                throw new UnexpectedExceptionError( e );
960            }
961            retValue.put( TypeName.from( type ), TypeName.from( converterClass ) );
962        }
963
964        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
965        return retValue;
966    }   //  loadStringConverters()
967}
968//  class CodeBuilderBase
969
